nodes.text: A male Valltii served as lead rider for a group of Valltii riders during the Clone Wars. The Valltii had been an acquaintance of Galen Walton Erso, and even had tea with the scientist. Around two weeks after a meeting between him and Dr. Erso Vallt joined the Confederacy of Independent Systems, and he was ordered to hunt down Erso with the rest of the Iron Gauntlet Legion. The Valltii followed the order.
